text.more:
The following Lineage information are tracked:
1. Project -> Impacted Capabilities
2. Project -> Impacted Attributes
3. Attributes -> Impacted Systems
4. Attributes -> Change Frequency
text.intro:
The documentation comprises the following Nodes:
1. Projects
2. Capabilities
3. Attributes
4. Systems
text.title: Integration: Day-1 Project Impacts

legend.edgeLabel: the lineage of relationship (associated impact) is represented by the connecting arrows
legend.colorLabel: color represents grouping by Attribute, System, Project, Capability & Frequency of update
legend.nodeLabel: Individual components of the groups are represented as nodes
